title: The U.L. FUN Drip 2.0 May be the Lightest, Most Compact Coffee Dripper Out There
content:
I’m pretty sure we all love coffee, and I personally enjoy the occasional #coffeoutside. The new U.L. FUN Drip 2.0 looks like a clever design that would make your #coffeeoutside kit a lot lighter. The Ultra-Light Fun Drip 2.0 weighs a mere 11g (the same weight as 12 M&Ms or one Oreo cookie) and is made of 100% recyclable expanded polypropylene. It can be washed and used again and again.

The U.L. Fun Drip 2.0 is a true cone-shaped coffee dripper that is so slim, sleek, and light, that it can be easily stuffed in the crevices of your coffee outside kit, bikepacking, camping, or hiking gear.

It actually is said to fold down to only 1mm thick. It even comes in four colors, yellow, light blue, light grey, and dark grey.

Unlike the OG U.L. Fun Drip, the 2.0 offers expanded compatibility with various cup sizes ensuring a seamless transition from dripper to drinker. They also added a “stopper” that will make the 2.0 easier to use in the wind, leaving the drip process undisturbed.

Furthermore, the U.L. Fun Drip 2.0 is so flat and compact, it can fit in an envelope making it effortlessly able to be carried anywhere.

5 Essential Points of the U.L. Fun Drip 2.0

  • Ultra Light
  • Outstanding portability
  • It extracts two cups of coffee at the same time
  • Easy setup and clean up
  • Easy to maintain

How to Get Yours

The U.L. Fun Drip 2.0 will start fulfilling orders in September 2023 and will ship anywhere in the world. There are a couple of early bird pledge options on their Kickstarter. The first option gets you a Fun Drip 2.0 and a LokSak storage bag for a 10% discount bringing the total to $18 (retail $20).
